page.title: 14ELECTRICITY
page.content: Electricity came in in the 19th century.It was not invented it was discovered. Electricity is very popular here in 1985. And it is powerful and important too.Electric- ity is used a lot round the home. Lots of electric things are coming in too like microwave ovens came out about 2 years ago. 100 years ago you didn't have any electric ovens,T.V.s or anything.It must be quite hard to live back 100 years ago. Electricity is very powerful so powerful that it can kill someone. Electricity is very useful round the home. You would not be able to have videos,computers,dish- washers,fridges,telephones,TVs,radios, door bells.If you never had electricity I don't think many people could live without it. {BY SARAH ELKINS
